judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Hughes, JJ.

opinions.text:
Pee Cubiam,
The decree of the court below in the above-entitled case is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Eevin, appellant to pay the costs.
opinions.author: Pee Cubiam,

attorneys: George W. Keitel, Deputy Attorney General, with him R. Paul Lessy and James II. Duff, Attorney General, for appellant.
John O. Noonan, with him Harold D. Greenwell, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Townsend Trust.
Argued January 5,1944.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Hughes, JJ.
George W. Keitel, Deputy Attorney General, with him R. Paul Lessy and James II. Duff, Attorney General, for appellant.
John O. Noonan, with him Harold D. Greenwell, for appellee.
March 20, 1944:
